name: Staff of Souls
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Souls

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, death ward, deathwatch, detect undead, gentle repose, speak with dead

sections.body:
This ominous staff allows use of the following spells:

  • deathwatch (1 charge)
  • detect undead (1 charge)
  • gentle repose (1 charge)
  • speak with dead (2 charges)
  • death ward (2 charges)
